mapper.select: /* com.sgg.application.login.mapper.LoginMapper.login */ SELECT A1.USER_ID , A1.USER_NM , A1.USER_AUTH , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM SGG_USER WHERE USER_PW = #{userPw} AND USER_ID = #{userId}) AS PASSWORD_CHECK , A1.LOGIN_CNT , A2.TEL_NO , A2.CITY , A2.EMAIL , A2.GEN , A2.COUNTRY , A2.ZIP , A2.ADDR , A2.ADDR_DTL FROM SGG_USER A1 , SGG_USER_INFO A2 WHERE 1 = 1 AND A1.USER_ID = A2.USER_ID(+) AND A1.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: /* com.sgg.application.login.mapper.LoginMapper.upLoginCount */ UPDATE SGG_USER SET LOGIN_CNT = CASE WHEN LOGIN_CNT >= 5 THEN 5 ELSE NVL(LOGIN_CNT, 0) + 1 END WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
